MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.33am to carry out repairs on faulty electrical equipment in the local area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.09am on Monday 1st March 2021.
